dialogue_data.history:
Dilaogue History:
User: Pardon me?  Do you have any joggers in dark green?
System: Sure, how do you like the dark green joggers in the second cubby from the right?
User: They're decent, maybe what I want first is coat though.  what do you have with a plain pattern?
System: Take a look at the black coat hanging up on the far left rack, and the grey coat hanging up on the rack in the back right corner.  If those colors don't suit you, I can also offer the brown coat in the fifth cubby from the right.  Do any of those interest you?
User: Do you have anything else?
System: Sure, other plain coats include the black coat in the fourth cubby from the left, the black coat in the fourth cubby from the right, and the black coat hanging up on the rack in the center of the room.  Do any of those grab your attention?
dialogue_data.utterance: User: I think I like the grey coat on the back right rack, and the brown coat in the fifth cubby from the right the most.  Do you have anything else available in the same sizes?

prompt:
You are a helpful assistant tasked with identifying specific object IDs from references made in conversation snippets.

The scene contains multiple objects, each identified by an ID and characterized by attributes including name, color, and size. Analyze the current utterance to determine which objects are being mentioned based on their described attributes. Match these details with the attributes of objects in the scene to accurately identify and return the corresponding object IDs. If an utterance refers to multiple objects, detect and respond with all relevant object IDs. To understand the context better, the dialogue history, if available, is shared under the label 'Dialogue History'.

Dilaogue History:
User: Pardon me?  Do you have any joggers in dark green?
System: Sure, how do you like the dark green joggers in the second cubby from the right?
User: They're decent, maybe what I want first is coat though.  what do you have with a plain pattern?
System: Take a look at the black coat hanging up on the far left rack, and the grey coat hanging up on the rack in the back right corner.  If those colors don't suit you, I can also offer the brown coat in the fifth cubby from the right.  Do any of those interest you?
User: Do you have anything else?
System: Sure, other plain coats include the black coat in the fourth cubby from the left, the black coat in the fourth cubby from the right, and the black coat hanging up on the rack in the center of the room.  Do any of those grab your attention?


Below is the scene description. Each line contains a tuple with the format (object_id, type, color, size), describing each object in the scene.

object_id, object_type, object_color, object_size
91, coat, grey, XXL
25, coat, brown, XL
15, coat, black, XL


Your response should list the matched object IDs under the label 'ObjectID', followed by a newline.

Do not generate any other text or explanations.
